div.p: N66/895, unit 177, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the following expenditure in this establishment to meet the first current liabilities of the year.

div.p: In reference to this latter item I may remark, that it exceeds somewhat the estimated average sum of the wages fund for one month; the excess of expenditure was however unavoidable to keep the vast number of trees planted in the garden & reserve alive during the distressing period of drought, though all the garden employees have had over and over extra night-duties, for which no extrapayment will be rendered.
